title: Contacts
subtitle: Manage the digital contacts where you can receive legal value communications from SEND and/or courtesy messages for <0>your business</0>.

legal-contacts.title: Your business's Digital Domicile

pec-validation-banner.title: PEC is being validated
pec-validation-banner.dod-enabled-message: Until the process is complete, the SEND Platform remains active as your Digital Domicile.
pec-validation-banner.dod-disabled-message: Until the process is complete, it will not be possible to modify the legal value contacts.
pec-validation-banner.parties-list: The SEND platform will remain your Digital Domicile for {{list}} until validation is complete.

legal-contacts.pec-disclaimer: This is the main address that will be used to send digital notifications for the business. By entering it, the business will no longer receive paper registered letters.
legal-contacts.pec-description: When an entity sends a SEND notification to your business, it is delivered securely and with legal value to the PEC you have chosen.
legal-contacts.pec-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated PEC address. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
legal-contacts.pec-new-code: Didn't receive it? Check that you have entered the correct PEC or <0>generate a new one</0>.
legal-contacts.remove-pec-title: Confirm you want to deactivate the PEC?
legal-contacts.remove-pec-message: <0>You will no longer have a legal value digital contact for Public Administration communications and you might receive them on paper, with potential costs for the business.</0><1>You will, however, continue to receive alerts on the channels you have activated.</1>
legal-contacts.validation-cancel-content: If you confirm, you cancel the activation of the PEC as the Digital Domicile on SEND.
legal-contacts.validation-progress-content: We are verifying that the PEC address is valid. You will receive an email with the outcome within 24 hours.
legal-contacts.sercq_send-description: When an entity sends a SEND notification to your business, it is delivered securely and with legal value through the platform itself.
legal-contacts.sercq-send-description-pec-enabled: Use SEND as your Digital Domicile to manage your SEND notifications in one place, without worrying about paper registered letters and associated costs anymore.
legal-contacts.sercq-send-info-description: By activating the Digital Domicile, SEND becomes your business's legal value contact for PA communications.

sercq-send-info-list.title: 100% digital notifications
sercq-send-info-list.description: SEND notifications will no longer reach you in paper format.

sercq-send-info-list.title: Savings on postalization costs
sercq-send-info-list.description: You won't have to worry about picking up paper documents and paying the related costs.

sercq-send-info-list.title: Everything in one place
sercq-send-info-list.description: SEND notifications will be delivered securely and will all be available in your business's reserved SEND area.

legal-contacts.sercq-send-info-tos: By selecting “Activate” you declare that you have read and accept the <0>Terms of Service</0>.
legal-contacts.remove-sercq_send-title: Confirm you want to deactivate the Digital Domicile on SEND?
legal-contacts.remove-sercq_send-message: <0>If you choose to deactivate the SEND Digital Domicile, your business may receive communications via registered letter and pay the related costs.<1>The business will continue to receive alerts via email, you can deactivate them in the Your Contacts section.
legal-contacts.block-remove-digital-domicile-message: To proceed, you must first deactivate the personalized digital domiciles per entity.

sercq-send-wizard.title: Activate Digital Domicile on SEND
sercq-send-wizard.title-transfer: Transfer the Digital Domicile to the SEND platform

step_1.title: How it works

info-list.title: An entity sends a SEND notification for the business
info-list.description: The notification is <0>delivered</0> securely and with legal value through the platform

info-list.title: You receive a message
info-list.description: When a notification arrives on SEND for your business, we notify you via email and, if you wish, also via SMS

info-list.title: Access the notification
info-list.description: Open the details of the digital notification on the SEND platform

step_1.info-tos: By pressing “Activate” you declare that you have read and accept the <0>Terms of Service</0>.
step_1.have-pec: Do you prefer to use the company PEC?
step_1.have-pec-description: Alternatively, you can use a PEC as your Digital Domicile for SEND notifications.
step_1.delivered-dialog-title: Legal value of the notification on the SEND Digital Domicile
step_1.delivered-dialog-description: If you choose SEND as your Digital Domicile, 7 days after delivery the notification will be legally deemed delivered, even if you haven't consulted it.
step_1.pec-info-alert: The SEND platform will replace the company PEC as your business's Digital Domicile.

step_2.title: The email to receive alerts about SEND notifications
step_2.content: The company email where we will notify the business when there is a new legal value communication on SEND.
step_2.sms-disclaimer: If you press Add number you save this contact to receive alerts about SEND notifications for the business. You can manage it in the Contacts section.

step_3.title: You are activating the Digital Domicile on SEND
step_3.content: Legal value communications for the business will be delivered to:
step_3.courtesy-content: You have chosen to receive a message on:
step_3.disclaimer-enable: By pressing “Activate Digital Domicile” you declare that you have read the <0>Privacy Policy</0> and accept the <1>Terms of Service</1>
step_3.disclaimer-transfer: By pressing “Transfer Digital Domicile” you declare that you have read the <0>Privacy Policy</0> and accept the <1>Terms of Service</1>

feedback.title-transfer: You have updated your business's Digital Domicile
feedback.title-sercq_send-activation: You have activated the Digital Domicile on SEND
feedback.title-sercq_send-transfer: You have transferred your business's Digital Domicile to SEND
feedback.content-pec: The PEC you entered is being validated. Once confirmed, the Digital Domicile will be activated and the business will receive all legal value communications at the address you chose.
feedback.content-pec-transfer: The PEC is being validated. Once confirmed, the business's Digital Domicile will be transferred to the address you chose. Until then, the SEND Digital Domicile will remain active.
feedback.content-sercq_send: The business will receive legal value communications at the Digital Domicile on SEND and a message to the contacts you chose.

pec-contact-wizard.title: Use a PEC as Digital Domicile
pec-contact-wizard.title-transfer: Transfer the Digital Domicile to a company PEC
pec-contact-wizard.content-description: When an entity sends a SEND notification to your business, you receive the legal value communication on the PEC you chose.
pec-contact-wizard.sercq-info-alert: The company PEC will replace the SEND platform as the business's Digital Domicile.
pec-contact-wizard.disclaimer: I accept that this address be used by SEND in priority over any PEC registered with a sending entity or present in public registers.

digital-domicile-management.title: Manage Digital Domicile
digital-domicile-management.sercq_send-active: The SEND platform is your business's Digital Domicile

transfer.title-pec: Transfer the Digital Domicile to the SEND platform
transfer.content-pec: The SEND platform ensures secure deliveries with legal value. The service is free and does not require additional tools.
transfer.title-sercq_send: Transfer the Digital Domicile to a company PEC
transfer.content-sercq_send: If you have a PEC, you can use it as your Digital Domicile for SEND notifications.

special_contacts.title: Customize the Digital Domicile per sending entity
special_contacts.content: Choose where to receive notifications sent to your business by a specific entity.

courtesy-contacts.email-empty-description: Add a company email address where we can notify you when there is a SEND notification for your business.
courtesy-contacts.email-filled-description: When there is a notification for your business, we inform you with an email at the address you chose.
courtesy-contacts.email-sms-updates: Do you want to receive alerts via SMS too?
courtesy-contacts.sms-description: When there is a notification for your business, we notify you with an SMS.
courtesy-contacts.email-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated email address. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.sms-verify-descr: We have sent a code to the indicated mobile number. The code is valid for 15 minutes.
courtesy-contacts.email-new-code: Didn't receive it? Check that you have entered the correct email or <0>generate a new one</0>.
courtesy-contacts.sms-new-code: Didn't receive it? Check that you have entered the correct mobile number or <0>generate a new one</0>.
courtesy-contacts.email-and-sercq-removed-successfully: Email and SEND Digital Domicile deactivated
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-pec-enabled-title: Do you want to deactivate your company email?
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-pec-enabled-message: <0>If you deactivate the company email address, we cannot notify you when there is a legal value communication for your business.<1>Remember that, if the notification is not read in time, the business might not be aware of any deadlines and incur penalties.
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-no-domicile-message: If you confirm, you will no longer receive the email on {{value}} when there is a SEND notification to read.
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-preconfirm-title: Do you want to deactivate email alerts?
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-preconfirm-message: <0>If you deactivate the email address, we cannot notify you when there is a legal value communication for your business.
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-and-sercq-title: The SEND Digital Domicile is also deactivated with the email
courtesy-contacts.remove-email-and-sercq-message: <0>If you choose to deactivate the SEND Digital Domicile, your business may receive communications via registered letter and pay the related costs.
courtesy-contacts.remove-sms-title-dod-enabled: Do you want to deactivate SMS alerts?
courtesy-contacts.remove-sms-message-dod-enabled: <0>If you deactivate the company phone number, you will not receive SMS alerts when there is a legal value communication for your business on SEND.<1>Remember that if the business does not read a SEND notification in time, it might not be aware of any deadlines and incur penalties.
courtesy-contacts.remove-sms-message: If you confirm, you will no longer receive the SMS on {{value}} when there is a SEND notification to read.
courtesy-contacts.info-modal-email-subtitle: When there are new SEND notifications for your business, you will receive an alert at the entered company email address.
courtesy-contacts.info-modal-email-content: If you do not have an active Digital Domicile and you do not open the notification within 5 days of receiving the email, you will receive the documents in paper format at home.
courtesy-contacts.info-modal-sms-subtitle: When there are new SEND notifications for your business, you will receive an SMS at the entered number.
courtesy-contacts.info-modal-sms-content: If you do not have an active Digital Domicile and you do not open the notification within 5 days of receiving the email, you will receive the documents in paper format at home.
courtesy-contacts.confirmation-modal-title: Add a company email address for alerts!
courtesy-contacts.confirmation-modal-email-content: <0>To activate the SEND Digital Domicile, we need a company email address, so we can send an alert when there is a legal value communication for your business.
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-email-message: To proceed, you must first remove the personalized emails per entity.
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-email-sercq-default-pec-spe: To proceed, you must first deactivate the Digital Domicile and personalized contacts.
courtesy-contacts.block-remove-sms-message: To proceed, you must first delete the personalized mobile numbers per entity.

special-contacts.contact-to-add-description: The personalized Digital Domicile where your business will receive SEND notifications sent by a specific entity.
special-contacts.contact-already-exists: <0>This entity is already associated with the contact {{contactValue}}.<1>If you press Confirm, you will replace it with the one just entered.
special-contacts.validating-pec-banner-content: <0>You have already entered a PEC for this entity which is currently being validated.</0><1>Once confirmed, you can modify it.</1>
special-contacts.validating-pec-error-message: You have already entered a PEC for this entity that is currently in validation
special-contacts.fetch-party-error: We were unable to retrieve the data needed to create a new contact.
special-contacts.add-title: Insert the entity and the contact to be associated
special-contacts.remove-special-description: Alerts related to notifications from the associated entities will no longer be sent to this contact, but to the main one.
special-contacts.pec-disclaimer: By filling in the field and pressing Confirm you accept that the PEC address you chose is used by SEND for sending notifications from this specific sending entity, in priority over the platform's Digital Domicile, an eventual Digital Domicile elected at the same sending entity, or one present in public registers

courtesy-banner.title: Feature discontinued
courtesy-banner.description: You can no longer insert personalized courtesy contacts per entity or modify existing contacts. If you delete a personalized contact you will not be able to recover it or insert it again.

special-contacts.email-description: The email where we will notify your business when it receives a legal value communication on SEND.
special-contacts.sercq-disclaimer: By pressing “Confirm” you declare that you have read the <0>Privacy Policy</0> and accept the <1>Terms of Service</1>

common.duplicate-contact-descr: The contact {{value}} is already present, do you still want to proceed?
common.duplicate-default-contact-title: This contact is already used as Digital Domicile
common.duplicate-default-contact-descr:
The contact {{value}} is already used as the main Digital Domicile on SEND.
To customize the Digital Domicile per sending entity, choose a different contact.

invalid_verification_code.title: The code is wrong
invalid_verification_code.message: Check it and enter it again, or generate another one.

retry_limit_code.title: You have made too many attempts
retry_limit_code.message: You have entered a wrong code too many times. To try again, press “Cancel”, make sure the contact is correct and enter the new code.

expired_verification_code.title: The code has expired
expired_verification_code.message: Generate a new one and enter it.

domicile-banner.no-sercq-send-title: No more paper documents: activate SEND as Digital Domicile
domicile-banner.no-sercq-send-description: Choose the SEND platform as your Digital Domicile to receive future notifications only digitally and read them in real-time, wherever you are.
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-description: Without a courtesy contact, we cannot notify you when there is a legal value communication to read on SEND.
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-sercq-send-title: Do you want to receive the next notifications only digitally?
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-sercq-send-description: Activate SEND as your Digital Domicile and stop worrying about paper registered letters.
domicile-banner.no-courtesy-no-sercq-send-description: Add an email address to receive an alert when you have a new notification on SEND.
